name: Project Snyder Labs Covid19 Empatica
description: Project specific EM for the Snyder Lab Covid Empatica project

project-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

AUTO POPULATE RSP Participant Info Form
Upon save of the triggering instrument, the RSP Participant Info form is automatically populated and saved.

Auto-create the participant info page
Check here to autocreate the rsp_participant_info page for the record

Survey Portal EM Config Name
The Unique Config ID used for the surveys in the Survey Portal EM (ex: daily)

Config Field
This TEXT field that contains the Survey config id (i.e.daily, weekly, etc

Participant Information Instrument
The survey preference is in this form, update with newly selected option (default is both disabled).

Admin Instrument
When this admin form is saved, the EM will check to see if the record complete checkbox has been checked.

Record Complete Field
When this field is checked, the RSP portal will be disabled for this record (emails and sms also disabled).

NOT USED FOR EMPATICA
Default date to enter for Survey Portal Start
Enter date to enter for all newly created records. Enter in the format 'Y-m-d'. Ex: '2020-03-15
Leave blank to enter 'today'

Triggering Event Name
Name of event where triggering form is enabled.

Triggering Instrument
The redcap form that triggers auto-creation. This form contains the the field defining the triggering logic entered below

Unsubscribe Instrument
This form contains the the field selecting the unsubscribe option.

Unsubscribe Field
The field selecting the unsubscribe option.

Withdraw Field
The field selecting the withdraw option.

Logic to trigger auto-create
Enter logic to trigger rsp_participant_info creation. For example, an email has been entered: [email_address_v2]<>''

Save Target Instrument
If this field is specified, after the Participant Setup Instrument is populated, the fields will be saved to this instrument and the save record hook will be called.
If using the default RSP forms, this form should be RSP Participant Info Instrument

Email Field
Field where email is recorded for this participant (to be used for survey invtes/reminders)
